questions.question: Is there a limit on the amount I can transfer through the mobile banking app?
questions.answer: Yes, 1 million is the current daily limit. Transfer limits vary based on your account type. Check the “Limits” section in the app for specifics on daily transfer limits.

questions.question: How can I change limit of funds transfer?
questions.answer: To change your funds, transfer limit, go to the “My profile” section and select “Manage Limit” in the app, then select “Change FT/IBFT” limits.

questions.question: How can I add or update beneficiaries/ recipients of mobile banking app for funds transfer?
questions.answer: In the app, navigate to the “Transfer Funds” section and select “New Beneficiaries.” Here, you can choose to add a new beneficiary by entering their details or update existing beneficiary information.

questions.question: How do I perform international transactions through mobile app?
questions.answer: One can enable international transactions by tapping on card management, select manage debit card and choose “international tranx activation” option.

questions.question: Does the app support contactless payments or digital wallets?
questions.answer: For contactless payments NUST Bank has a separate mobile app named as NUST Digital Wallets. Customers can download and perform payments.

questions.question: Can I use the mobile app while I am overseas?
questions.answer: Yes, the NUST mobile app can be accessed globally. Ensure you have internet connectivity and your registered mobile number is active for OTPs if required.

questions.question: What should I do if I forget my login password?
questions.answer: Tap on 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Follow the steps to reset your password using your registered mobile number and verification details.

questions.question: Can I reset my MPIN through the app?
questions.answer: Yes, after logging into the app, go to 'Profile' → 'Change MPIN' and follow the prompts to reset your MPIN securely.

questions.question: What services are available under Bill Payment option?
questions.answer: You can pay utility bills, internet and mobile bills, and government fees using the 'Bill Payment' option in the app.

questions.question: How can I recharge mobile balance or buy top-up?
questions.answer: Use the 'Mobile Top-Up' feature. Select your network, enter the mobile number and amount, and confirm with your MPIN.

questions.question: Is biometric login supported in the app?
questions.answer: Yes, biometric login is supported. You can enable it under the 'Profile' section by turning on 'Fingerprint Login' for faster and secure access.

questions.question: Can I view my debit card details using the mobile app?
questions.answer: You can view basic card details like the card status and activation options. For full card info, please contact the bank for security reasons.

questions.question: How can I report an issue or give feedback within the app?
questions.answer: Go to the 'Contact Us' or 'Feedback' section in the app and submit your query or feedback. You can also email support@NUSTbank.com.pk.

questions.question: How can I deactivate or delete my mobile banking account?
questions.answer: For security reasons, deactivation or deletion requests must be submitted by calling the helpline at +92 (51) 111 000 494.

questions.question: Is the mobile app available in multiple languages?
questions.answer: Currently, the NUST mobile app supports English only. Multilingual support is being considered for future updates.
